HOT TO FIX // YB GLOBAL SHIPPING LLC FZ // MV HAPPY HERO - OPENING AT COLOMBO // MV ASHICO SYMPHONY - OPENING AT CHITTAGONG







Kind Attention: Chartering DeskDear Sir / Ma’am, Good Day, Please Propose Suitable Cargo for Voyage for Our Period Tonnage : Opening At Colombo - 15th August, 2024MV Happy HeroABT 10,090 MTDW TWEEN DECK GENERAL CARGO VESSELBUILT APRIL 2002 AT SHIN KURUSHIMA DOCKYARDPANAMANIAN FLAG - NK CLASS – IMO 9254276LOA  100.60M / LBP 93.50M / BM 18.80M / DM 13.00M / DRAFT 9.219MGRT 6,381T / NRT 3,658TTWO HOLDS (LOWER HOLDS ARE BOX SHAPE)HOLD CAPACITY GRAIN 13,999.08 M3 / BALE 12,857.98 M3DECK CRANE 23T X 2DERRICK 15T X 1( FIGURES ARE ALL ABOUT WITHOUT GUARANTEE).Opening At Chittagong - 13th August, 2024MV Ashico Symphony11,722 mtdw on 8.13mBuilt 2/2015, Shin Kurushima, JapanPanama flag,NK class -ss/dd 2/2025120.93/19.6m loa/beam2 hh - 15,976 cbm grain Bale - 14,854.51 cbmM/E: 5,3302 B&W type 6L35MCCranes 2/30MTDerrick 1/10MT( FIGURES ARE ALL ABOUT WITHOUT GUARANTEE). Pleased to Hear!! Best Regards,Ayush SharmaChartering, YB Global Shipping LLC-FZMobile/WhatsApp/Skype: +91 9523757703  www.ybglobalshipping.com|  chartering@ybglobalshipping.comThe Meydan Hotel, Granstad, 6th floor, Meydan Road, Nad Al Sheba, Dubai, U.A.EView email in browser
